title: Prepare Development Environment
content: Usually, we use VS Code as IDE and TypeScript as programming language. Follow the tutorials in the link to get started.

title: Get Access to Azure Resources
content: Go to the link here. Search for "TM-teamscloud" by keywords, select it and submit your request. It may take a day or two for the request to take effect.

title: Get Familiar With What We Do
content: Watch the video here to know how to develop a Teams App. You may also read the documents in the link. Follow the tutorial above and try to build and run a Teams App by yourself.
